Name: Shaper
About the game: 《Shaper》 is a voxel sandbox game in which terrain and creatures are randomly generated, The blocks that build the terrain will have rich shape changes, and the blocks can be destroyed and placed freely. How to play the game: Creatures will be randomly generated around the terrain. Defeat the creatures to obtain food and materials to help the character survive and develop. Block building is one of the main playing methods of the game. Collect enough block materials to build distinctive buildings. The collected squares can be used to synthesize items. Bows, swords and other weapons can be obtained through synthesis to improve combat effectiveness. Some building structures will be randomly generated along with the terrain, and players can explore and obtain the treasures therein.
